name: NEST (Dóczi Dominik)
description:
One Circ. One job. Nullify the Rects. This is NEST Pay attention to your controls, deal with the bad guys and don't expire. Features:
  • Fast-paced gameplay
  • Accessible controls (or so it would seem)
  • High-contrast, easy-on-the eyes graphics
Controls:

Arrow Keys = Move

X = Dash

Enter = Pause menu
